criteria: Accuracy in applying formulas for cylinders, pyramids, cones, and spheres
Ability to identify and extract relevant information from the problem.
Clarity and organization of the solution process.
descriptions: Does not attempt to apply any volume formulas or shows no understanding of the formulas.
Attempts to use volume formulas but makes significant errors in identifying the correct formula or in substituting values.
Applies volume formulas with some accuracy but makes frequent errors in calculations or substitutions, leading to incorrect solutions.
Applies most volume formulas correctly but may have occasional errors in calculations or substitutions. Solutions are mostly accurate.
Applies volume formulas correctly and accurately in most cases, with only minor errors. Solutions are generally correct and well-supported.
Consistently and accurately applies volume formulas for cylinders, pyramids, cones, and spheres to solve problems. Demonstrates a strong understanding of the formulas and their application.
Unable to identify necessary information from the problem to apply volume formulas.
Struggles to identify relevant information and extract it to apply volume formulas.
Identifies and extracts some relevant information with errors in applying volume formulas.
Identifies and extracts most of the relevant information and applies it to volume formulas, with some prompting
Identifies and extracts most of the relevant information and applies it to volume formulas correctly with minor errors
Accurately identifies and extracts all relevant information from problems and uses it effectively to solve problems using volume formulas.
Solution process is unclear, disorganized, and difficult to follow.
Solution process is somewhat disorganized and lacks clarity, making it difficult to understand the steps taken.
Solution process is partially organized but may have gaps or unclear explanations.
Solution process is generally clear and organized, with most steps explained adequately.
Solution process is clear, organized, and easy to follow, with logical steps and explanations.
Solution process is exceptionally clear, well-organized, and easy to follow, with detailed explanations and logical reasoning throughout.
